name: Tracker World
description:
Scootch blocks and dont get squooshed. 

Vaguely inspired by the horrors of Microsoft Excel  and the coolness of music trackers.

HOW TO PLAY:

The scanline will destroy sets of 3 or more blocks with matching numbers or colors.

Destroy blocks to score.

Destroy blocks quickly to score more.

Arrow keys to move.

Also the blocks make sounds.

SOUNDS from the very cool 01010111!

https://01010111.itch.io/

For FirePit Game-A-Week 2022 - Theme: Sensory Overload

AND

Eggplant Monthly Game Jam  - Theme: Fun with Hexes
